description:
Tsuna and his friends are trapped and forced to fight illusory opponents that look exactly like them. These illusions have Daemon’s voice and reflect his intentions, and they attack the gang to try to change them to match Daemon Spade’s ideal. His ideal Vongola Family is a mafia organization with the powerful ability to control and take over the enemy and keep growing stronger. Will Tsuna and his friends be able to win against Daemon Spade and stand firm in their convictions? In the middle of the battle, Daemon Spade tells them about his act of betrayal…
Source: crunchyroll
